snippet: WHITE--Alan. The Fisher Center mourns the loss of our EVP, Mr. Alan White, who was with the Foundation for over 12 years. The Foundation was blessed to have Alan be part of our mission to find a cure for Alzheimer's. On behalf of the Board of Trustees. Kent L. Karosen, Pres./CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: WHITE--Alan. The Fisher Center mourns the loss of our EVP, Mr. Alan White, who was with the Foundation for over 12 years. The Foundation was blessed to have Alan be part of our mission to find a cure for Alzheimer's. On behalf of the Board of Trustees. Kent L. Karosen, Pres./CEO 1/3
